about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey into the heart of darkness in "Amulet," a gripping hack-and-slash RPG dungeon crawler with a haunting gothic theme. Channeling the spirit of classics like Diablo 2, "Amulet" sets itself apart with innovative gameplay mechanics that redefine the way you approach your adventure.

Warning:
This game is meant to be hard.

Key Features:

  • Minimalist Inventory: Embrace the challenge of decision-making with only four precious item slots - Weapon, Helm, Armor, and Shoes. Every discovery forces you to weigh the value of new loot against your current gear, ensuring a constant thrill of trade-offs.

  • Pure Loot System: Forget experience points and leveling up. In "Amulet," your character's attributes and skills are entirely determined by the mystical items you carry. Manage your limited inventory like a hand of cards, each item granting unique skills, magical abilities, and class points.

  • Linked Sub-Attributes: Delve into the intricacies of sub-attributes tied to your characteristics. Gain health, magic, agility and more based on your class points. Every decision echoes through your character's performance, creating a dynamic and strategic gaming experience.

  • Varied Weaponry: Wield the power of swords, bows, and staffs, with more weapon types promised in future updates.

  • Multiplayer Enabled:
    Easily join a server to enjoy playing with others.

Are you ready to face the darkness and become the hero the village desperately needs? Uncover the secrets of "Amulet" as you embark on an unforgettable adventure filled with peril, loot, and the ever-present allure of the unknown.
